column4: GAIM likes to disconnect my MSN account sometimes. Is this a common issue? Is it GAIM, or is it MSN?
Damn Microsoft :P
its a bit of both, MSN drops it, but GAIM sometimes get stuck on reconnect
/etc/X11/xorg.conf -> pastebin
http://pastebin.com/664329 -- but keep in mind, that's after re-running dpkg-reconfigure outside of the gdm because gdm wouldn't load..
I found your problem
shoot.

how do I reload my xorg without rebooting?
I'm in 1280x1024 now, great..
are you sure your monitor supports a higher refresh rate?
okies, lemme look
are you able to change the refresh rate in System -> Preferences -> resolution
I know where the problem is, erm, I just suck at the math
what refresh rate does it normally run?
on your monitor there should be printed (probably somewhere on the back) the horizontal and vertical sync (they will be ranges givin in hertz)
for vert or horizontal?
